remarks: Heine-Borel theorem for complex numbers.  A subset of ` CC ` is compact iff it is closed and bounded.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2014.)
statement:
cnheibor.2 $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
cnheibor.3 $e |- T = ( J |`t X ) $.
cnheibor $p |- ( X C_ CC -> ( T e. Comp <-> ( X e. ( Clsd ` J ) /\ E. r e. RR A. x e. X ( abs ` x ) <_ r ) ) ) $.
$d J r x $.
$d T r x $.
$d X r x $.
